Question.Subject: how long is amazon FREE Super Saver Shipping?
Question.Content:
has anyone recently bought anything from amazon using free shipping??
how long does it take to deliver??
Question.ChosenAnswer: It's pretty good. The arrival time varies a bit - I ordered the Devil May Cry 5th edition boxset a few months ago and it arrived within decent time, like five days or fewer. I was surprised and very pleased. On the other hand, I have ordered a few things and it took roughly one to two weeks. That may have been because the product was in low stock, but it wasn't too long. I like Super Saver shipping because 1) I'm not terribly impatient, and 2) it's FREE! Some items' shipping costs are more than the item itself, but if I do Super Saver shipping, it knocks that down. Hope this helps!

I like Super Saver shipping because 1) I'm not terribly impatient, and 2) it's FREE! Some items' shipping costs are more than the item itself, but if I do Super Saver shipping, it knocks that down. Hope this helps!
